title: Eddie S. Glaude Jr. - "Begin Again," James Baldwin and a Moral Reckoning for America
itunes:title: Eddie S. Glaude Jr. - "Begin Again," James Baldwin and a Moral Reckoning for America
description:
Eddie S. Glaude Jr. talks about his book "Begin Again," which delves into the life of writer James Baldwin and his struggle for racial equality. Originally aired July 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
